author: theblock.co
title: Texas Governor Greg Abbott signs strategic Bitcoin reserve bill into law
description: Abbott also passed a companion bill that shelters the strategic Bitcoin reserve, alongside other state funds, from periodic 'fund-sweeps.'
content:
Abbott also passed a companion bill that shelters the strategic Bitcoin reserve, alongside other state funds, from periodic 'fund-sweeps.'
This story appeared on theblock.co, 2025-06-21 21:13:25.
